Contributing to Imanage
=======================

Hey there and welcome to Imanage!

We've got an contributors guide in [our documentation](https://docs.imanage.org/developer/contributing/).

Please note that we have a [Code of Conduct](https://docs.imanage.org/developer/contributing/codeofconduct/) in place
that applies to all project contributions, including issues, pull requests, etc.
